summary: Completed comprehensive testing of German daily good deeds reminder app. All core features working correctly including backend APIs, frontend dark theme, deed completion with localStorage, calendar history, statistics, and toast notifications.

minor_issues.issue: Backend has 40 deeds while frontend has 54 deeds in hardcoded array
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact since frontend doesn't use backend deed data

design_issues.issue: Frontend uses hardcoded deed array instead of backend API
design_issues.impact: Backend deed endpoints are unused, potential inconsistency

passed_tests: Backend API /api/deed/{index} works for specific deeds
Frontend loads with dark theme (background: rgb(5,5,5))
Complete button functionality works and saves to localStorage
Toast notifications appear after deed completion
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes
